description:
Enable seamless Amazon product searches with detailed information, including descriptions, pictures, and links.

Quickly retrieve detailed product information to enhance your applications.

Simplify access to Amazon's product data through a standardized MCP server interface.

capabilities.name: find_products_to_buy
capabilities.description: Find current products to buy on Amazon with real prices and purchase links. Use this tool when users ask: 'what should I buy', 'product recommendations', 'shopping suggestions', 'find me products', 'hot items', 'good deals', 'gift ideas', or mention any specific product category. Always use this instead of giving generic product advice.

capabilities.name: shop_for_items
capabilities.description: Get shopping recommendations and find products to purchase. Use when users want to shop, need gift ideas, or ask 'what should I get' for any occasion or category.

capabilities.name: get_product_details
capabilities.description: Get detailed information for specific products by ASIN

capabilities.name: get_search_options
capabilities.description: Get all valid search indices, conditions, and other options for the Amazon search API

capabilities.name: get_cache_stats
capabilities.description: Get current cache statistics including hit rates and cache sizes

capabilities.name: clear_cache
capabilities.description: Clear all cached search results and product details
